response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $800,000. However, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $750,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
